articles.title: Mars and Hershey’s accused of avoiding fair pay for cocoa farmers - The Hindu
articles.description: Two of the world’s largest cocoa producers accuse Hershey’s and Mars of avoiding paying a bonus to farmers and cancel all sustainability programmes — that certify the chocolate is ethically produced and allow firms to sell it at higher prices — run by them.
articles.content: Two of the worlds largest cocoa producers have accused Hersheys and Mars of avoiding paying a bonus that helps boost poor farmers incomes, and have cancelled sustainability schemes run by the confect… [+1668 chars]

articles.title: Oil Companies Pause Petrol, Diesel Price Hike Again On Tuesday - NDTV Profit
articles.description: In Delhi, the price of petrol was untouched at Rs 82.34 per litre and diesel remained at Rs 72.42 per litre with effect from 6 am November 29, according to Indian Oil Corporation.
